headline: EDWARDS ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 56.5 CFM
description: Two Stage Mechanical Vacuum Pump          Once sold, all mechanical vacuum pumps will be rebuilt to factory specifications, unless stated otherwise.  All rebuilt pumps are sold with a one year warranty on parts and labor.  Pumps can be ordered Fomblin® or standard hydrocarbon oil prepped.   Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.    Edwards E2M80
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
